bug.author: kishankhakhar
bug.summary: Broken Link in "How to Contribute" pages
bug.description:
On this following pages of documentation, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/wiki/How_to_contribute>link to page1</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/projects/opencv/wiki/How_to_contribute>link to page2</denchmark-link> , there is a broken link on the first most line that takes me to Please look upon it asap. Broken link URL : <denchmark-link:http://opencv.org/contribute.html>http://opencv.org/contribute.html</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Actually the link to page 1 can be fixed, but the second one will not, since that devzone is deprecated and replaced by issues here. Replacement link should be <denchmark-link:http://opencv.org/about.html#contribute>http://opencv.org/about.html#contribute</denchmark-link>
